thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Barclays CEO Raises Dividend to Appease Investors

author: Max Colchester
title: Barclays CEO Raises Dividend to Appease Investors
text:
LONDON—Barclays PLC Chief Executive Jes Staley pledged Thursday to more than double dividends at the loss-making British bank, as the U.S. executive looks to appease disgruntled shareholders.
The move came as the bank reported a £1.9 billion ($2.64 billion) net loss for 2017, compared with a £1.6 billion profit the previous year, hit by a charge related to U.S. tax reform and poor returns at its investment bank’s trading unit.
However,...
